body:
There will always be the guys who says "I dont care about this" but just imagine that.

I know the friends of my sister. When i was a little boy i was playing with 'em and my sister. Now imagine that.
The mother of one of this friends have been killed and threw to the rails. 

Now imagine that person (20 years old) with the parents divorcied. He doesn't have any parents right now.

RIP. Why the people do that? She was a worker person...

:(

title: RIP. For a person i know.

replies.body:
Goodbye, hope you will be back once.. :(

it was a good time w/ u.


lol

There are things u can't change, it doesn't matter how bad some people are... I know it's sad but you can't do anything now, unless you invent the time-machine.

RIP
replies.body_tagged:

it was a good time w/ u.

replies.body:
Because this is a sensitive topic, please have respect and do not make jokes on this thread. If you do you may be punished and the thread will be locked down.

Alright carry on!
replies.body_tagged:
Because this is a sensitive topic, please have respect and do not make jokes on this thread. If you do you may be punished and the thread will be locked down.

Alright carry on!

replies.body:
Those things will keep happening. They could be decreased of course, but some people just aren't nice...
You can't go back to the past but we can take this terrible moment as a lesson for the future and try to stop any further death.
By the way, I'm really sorry for your loss. I hope her family is okay (the best they can; you know what I mean) and I wish them the best future. My condolences to them.

replies.body:
RIP
I understand the feeling I lost 6 relatives in less then 10 months and they were all from my dads side.

RIP
#2015WorstYear
replies.body_tagged:
RIP

replies.body:
I feel you, 2 of my relatives have died recently, one killed himself with alcohol overdose, and the other (diabetic) with sugar overdose.
It's a sad world we live in.
Or was it 3 that killed themselves, i can't remember, they seem to keep dying so fast i can't even keep up.
But it's alright, i never even saw or really knew them.
